channel.title: Blog on Sumartian Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Sumartian Studios

item.title: Future of Sumartian Studios
item.description: Hiatus I stopped working on this hobby project for a few years to focus on real life. I initially started the project during the pandemic as a bit of a joke so I don’t even know if I’m going to continue it any further.

item.title: Between Mona Lisa: Steganography?
item.description: Steganography The practice of hiding data inside something else like a physical object or a computer file. There are various ways to create hidden messages using steganography like using secrets inks, lights, musical pitch keys, and different encoding algorithms for digital data.

item.title: Continuing to Build Invictus
item.description: I am working on a new “intergalactic” data browser written in C++23, QML, and Qt6. The goal is to design a software system that can be used by an AI to provide interactive user messages to users.
